DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study assess effect 'Seroquel-XR ' verbal learning ability people at-risk mental state ( ARMS ) 12 week period . The verbal learning ability index delay free recall score CVLT ( California Verbal learn Test ) , standard neuropsychological verbal memory test . The secondary objective ass effect 'Seroquel-XR ' cognitive function psychiatric symptom include psychotic , anhedonic symptom , impulsivity . The cognitive function ability measure standard neuropsychological test follow ; - Working memory : verbal & spatial 2-back test - Attention : Digit Span , 3-7 CPT ( Continuous Performance Test ) - Executive function : WCST ( Wisconsin Card Sorting Test ) - Visuo-spatial ability : Rey Complex Figure Task copy - Visuomotor speed planning : Trail make test A & B - Verbal fluency : Controlled Oral Word Association Test ( COWAT ) The scale psychiatric symptom use follow ; - Psychotic symptom : Scales Prodromal scale ( SOPS ) , Positive negative syndrome scale ( PANSS ) - Anhedonia : Social Anhedonia Scale ( SAS ) , Physical Anhedonia Scale ( PAS ) - Social cognition : Ambiguous Intention Hostility Questionnaire ( AIHQ ) - Impulsivity : Barrett Impulsivity Scale ( BIS )
DOC.brief_title: Effects 'Seroquel-XR ' Improvement Neurocognitive Function People At-risk Mental States ( ARMS )
